pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform Tensor-on-Tensor Regression // Functions to predict one multi-way array (i.e., a tensor) from another multi-way array, using a low-rank CANDECOMP/PARAFAC (CP) factorization and a ridge (L_2) penalty [Lock, EF (2018) doi:10.1080/10618600.2017.1401544]. Also includes functions to sample from the Bayesian posterior of a tensor-on-tensor model.
